descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course introduces students to the philosophy, logic, and methods of sociological research. The entire class will collaborate on a research project using historical methods, qualitative methods, ethnographic methods, and survey methods. The course will pay close attention to ethics and politics of research. Provides a foundation for further work in social science research.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Class participation, response papers, midterm and final exam.
